description:
Getting rid of the clutter in your garage is easier than you think, and in just one weekend you can turn your overstuffed garage back into a useful room in your house. No more being late to work because you had to de-ice the windshield. No more searching for tools in an emergency or tripping over boxes just to get to the washing machine.

Best of all, you can park in the garage and start your days warm and dry.

You are in the right place if:

  • Your stuff is using more of your garage than you are
  • Someone else's stuff you inherited is keeping you awake at night
  • Your life circumstances have changed and you need to declutter asap

In this course you will learn:

  • Why people keep things they don't want or need
  • What we learned about clutter through several big moves
  • How to prep for your big weekend to insure success
  • How to take an inventory of what you have in just 15 minutes
  • How to create a workspace to declutter when there is no space to spare
  • Why and how to sort your stuff into categories
  • What to do with trash, recyclables, and donations
  • How to sell what is valuable but not valuable to you *as you declutter* (this is genius!)
  • How to put it all back in a way that makes sense
  • How to stay uncluttered so you never have to do this again
  • Why decluttering is an "inside" job
  • How you can learn more about decluttering your entire house to make room for the kind of life you want to live

Get started today and at the end of the training you'll have all the practical steps and motivate to dive in and declutter your big space. Let's get started!
title: How to Clean Out Your Garage in One Weekend
